rounds.comments: (Alex: ...and all correct responses are homophones--words that sound exactly the same. One word will be 2 letters; its companion will be 3 letters.)

clues.text:
Exist/
unwanted "bonnet" intruder

Nominative plural of "I"/
"Willie Winkie" preceder

Conjunction/
mineral

Gardening tool/
interjection following "Westward" or "Land"

Next to/
automatic advance to second round without having to play

rounds.text: This novel is dedicated to Esther Earl, who died of thyroid cancer at 16 & never got to read it
